name: Anubis
temple_description:
Anubis is the God of Death in ancient Egypt and the guardian of the dead on their journey to the afterlife.
She is powerful and, having assisted Isis in the creation of mummies, she is also known as the God of Embalming.
In the Weighing of Heart trial in the world of the dead, Anubis was responsible for measuring the weight of the hearts.

active_skills.name: Hand of Hell
active_skills.effect: Inflicts [Bleed], preventing all healing effects for 2 rounds

active_skills.name: Bloodseeking Pierce
active_skills.effect: Self heals by 100% of dealt DMG
